name: react-template
description: Simple react-based template that showcases different generator features that we can test in integration tests

asyncapiFileDir.description: This template by default also outputs the AsyncAPI document that was passed as input. You can specify with this parameter what should be the location of this AsyncAPI document, relative to specified template output.

singleFile.description: Allow to generate conditionalGeneration folder only if singleFile is set to false
